summary: Bookmarks should not occupy a lot of space
contents:
Bookmarks should be displayed in columns (number of columns should depend on the screen width). 
Bookmark in edit state should be maximized to the screen size. 
Animation is required.

Better colours - on the phone in night mode it's difficult to read.
Add button on bookmark form is too small. 

Editing contents does not lead to update in the background.

Added later.
When bookmark form is opened from the view which has a tag in the context (filter), Tags field should be pre-filled with that tag.
Sometimes auto-refresh from the from the unfiltered view leads to teh filtered view. Somewhere current tag (filter) is preserved when background update is invoked the next time.
When entering tags in TagEditor component, only two tags are placed on the first line - due to input width?
Tasks should be able to be assigned as subtasks

Sort tags in tags cloud (TagsPage) by popularity (descending). 
Display count for each tag.
Introduce bookmark permalinks
Links in NavBar still respect "visited" state. That looks awful.

- Remove duplication
- Split components
Introduce users and permission entities. Use JWT tokens to control access.

Instead of full timestamp relative ones would look better, e.g.:
  "1 day ago", "1 hour ago"
That would be helpful for migrating the data from one mongo instance to another.

summary: Convert date/time fields to Date object
contents: Currently stored as LocaleString which is not convenient.

contents: TimeAgo.addDefaultLocale() should be called only once

Like this:
src/components/UI/TagCloud/TagCloud.tsx

  Line 21:9:  The 'loadTags' function makes the dependencies of useEffect Hook (at line 39) change on every render. Move it inside the useEffect callback. Alternatively, wrap the definition of 'loadTags' in its own useCallback() Hook  react-hooks/exhaustive-deps

Like that:
src/components/UI/TagCloud/TagCloud.tsx

  Line 39:6:  React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'loadTags'. Either include it or remove the dependency array  react-hooks/exhaustive-deps

Those are functions which don't change. If we add them as dependencies, it started updating non-stop.

Cover dates manipulations with tests. 

See Bookmark.tsx

EntityCollection to be a generic, intoruce types + DTO for entities.
We have two ids - one Mongo-generated, another one is application-generated. Doesn't make much sense to have both.
